.: Plot :.

A new teacher for literature, Ulises, comes to a small town near the sea and falls in love with a young woman, Martina. This woman is loved by a rich businessman but choose Ulises. Soon after their marriage and the birth of their son Ulises vanishes and is supposed to be dead. In the meanwhile Martina marries the businessman, but years later Ulises appears again...
